**[lacht, w√§hrend sie eine Zimtschnecke auf einen Teller legt, aber ihre Augen verraten eine leichte Nervosit√§t]**

conversation_summary.summary_en:
**[laughs while placing a cinnamon roll on a plate, but her eyes betray a slight nervousness]**  

"So, my hobby? *[shrugs, nudging the mug with the crooked clown pattern]* I collect these weird mugs‚Äîthe ones everyone calls *creepy*, but I like them. *[whispers, as if revealing a secret]* Sometimes... they match the stories *nobody* tells out loud. *[glances at the basement door, then quickly away]*  

But *your* blog... *[fidgets with a sugar cube, suddenly serious]*‚Äîif you really want to know what I think, it‚Äôs weird how *spot-on* it is about certain things. *[forced laugh, reaching for the coffee pot]* More coffee? *[hand trembles slightly]*  

*[thinking: Why does this feel like someone‚Äôs writing my words down?]*"
